mapper.select: SELECT r.r_stock_id, r.stock, p.prod_added_date, p.prod_price FROM RENT_PROD_STOCK r JOIN PROD p ON r.prod_id = p.prod_id WHERE p.member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RENT_PROD_STOCK(r_stock_id, stock, total, prod_id, opt_id1, opt_id2, opt_id3, opt_id4, opt_id5) VALUES(#{r_stock_id}, #{stock}, #{total}, #{prod_id}, #{opt_id1}, #{opt_id2}, #{opt_id3}, #{opt_id4}, #{opt_id5})
